content: Who is going to be in Bialystok for ITP next week? I'll be there, as will @Mario Carneiro and @Edward Ayers.
I will arrive in Bialystok on Monday afternoon, and at the conference on Tuesday.
Expect a bunch of people from Imperial!
I will be at the conference the Wednesday till the Friday!
I'll be there the whole week (specifically to meet some more Lean people)!
I’ll be there for the whole week! Giving a talk on Wednesday
I'll be there but probably only on the Friday!
I am going to arrive 2023-07-30 at 12:43 local time.
Does anyone know where the conference is? I mean, in which room. In the website there is the address, ul. Konstantego Ciołkowskiego 1M, 15-245, but I don't see anything more precise.
The CS/math building. When you enter, you're immediately at the registration desk. Can't miss it.
Does anyone staying in Hotel Pod Herbem have a plug with a USB port or a UK plug adaptor I could borrow? Lost mine on the way here :(
I have a plug with a USB port. Room 14, 1st floor (one above the ground floor; I forget which numbering system is used where).
Thank you so much! Will be ten minutes
Does anyone have a USB-C → HDMI adapter I could borrow?
don't worry they have one at the thingy
It was great meeting you all! Safe travels!
Someone want to write a blog post?
